contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 21, 1988 D Stroud Brass Band Festival (Second Section)
Stroud Brass Band Festival (Second Section) 0 Entertainments Contest Stroud Brass Band Festival stroud-brass-band-festival-second-section
Stroud Subscription Rooms, Stroud, Gloucestershire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £150 and cup, 2nd £85 and cup, 3rd 50 and cup, 4th £25. Best euphonium - Carlton. Best percussion - United Co-op. Best cornet - Yeovil. 9 bands competed.
Oct. 25, 2014, 10:21 a.m. Feb. 7, 2017, 7:47 a.m.
